text: allah ha avasan dinaya visvasa karana pirisak allahta ha ohuge dutayananta viruddha vuvan hata priya karanu numba nodakinu æta. ovuhu ovunge piyavarun ho ovunge daruvan ho ovunge sahodarayin ho ovunge pavule gnatin vuvada. ovunge hadavat tula ohu deva visvasaya niyama kota ohugen vu atmayen ovun saktimat kala aya ovuhu veti. tavada evata yatin gamgavan gala basna (svarga) uyan valata ohu ovun ætulu karayi. ehi ovun sadatanikayinya. allah ovun gæna trptimat viya. ovuhu da ohu gæna trptimat vuha. allahge pirisa ovuhuya. dæna ganu. niyata vasayenma allahge pirisa vana ovuhumaya jayagrahakayo
